resources.string:
This is a Demo Application
to emulate IoT Sensor signals for integration
into a Smart Asset generated on the blockchain
with the BKX Proof-of-Asset Protocol.

Try:
	• Turning off airplane mode
	• Turning on mobile data or Wi-Fi
	• Checking the signal in your area
To use the application create a blockchain-based Smart Asset following the steps here
On the stage of Smart Asset validation:
Check for validation confirmation\n on the Smart Asset page
Failed to get asset id from the barcode
Place a barcode inside the viewfinder rectangle to scan it.
To use the application create a blockchain-based Smart Asset following the steps here
Press the “Send Shake” button or simply shake your phone to generate a motion sensor signal
Press the “Send Photo” button to generate a geolocation sensor signal and photo-verification
Asset id was attached to device successfully
